item.title: Hello World
item.description: This post is in the works. Check back later!

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
This is my new website and blog!

Once I have a few posts or projects, I’ll list them here. In the meantime, here’s my only post:

Hello World

I made this blog using Hugo. It was a great experience, and I’d definitely recommend it. The only tough part was that I wanted to use SASS and other new stuff, which required having a build process. You can see my setup on Github.

Hugo comes with an RSS feed. You can use the RSS icon in the sidebar to get it.
